en: It is night time.
Peppa and George are going to bed.
zh: 佩奇和乔治准备上床睡觉了。

en: Goodnight, Peppa and George!
Mummy, Daddy?
Yes, Peppa?
I am not sleepy.
Can I have a story?
But maybe George is sleepy and doesn't want a story.
zh: 但也许乔治困了不想听故事。

en: George, do you want a story?
zh: 乔治，你是不是想听故事？

en: Say ''yes''!!
Alright! I will tell you just one story!
If Daddy Pig tells you a story, you must both promise to go to sleep.
zh: 如果爸爸讲完故事，你们必须保证去睡觉。

en: We promise!
Hmmm. I think I'll tell you the story of ''The Sleepy Princess''.
zh: 嗯。我讲一个叫“沉睡公主”的故事吧。

en: Is it a good story?
zh: 它是一个精彩的故事吗？

en: It sounds a bit boring.
It's not boring! It's very good!
zh: 不会无聊的！它是一个很棒的故事！

en: Is there a little princess in it?
Peppa! If you keep talking, Daddy Pig can't start the story.
zh: 佩奇！如果你一直说话，爸爸就无法开始讲故事了。

en: Sorry, Mummy!
Is there a little princess in the story, Daddy?
zh: 故事里有小公主吗，爸爸？

en: Yes, there is a little princess in it.
''The Sleepy Princess.''
Once upon a time... in a castle, there lived a little princess.
zh: 很久以前。。。在一个城堡里，住了一位小公主。

en: And she was called the Sleepy Princess.
Daddy, why was she called that?
zh: 爸爸，她为什么叫沉睡公主？

en: I'll get to that later.
Was the Sleepy Princess pretty?
Yes, she was very pretty!
She loved looking at herseIf in the mirror.
zh: 她喜欢看镜子里的自己。

en: I am so pretty!
Who else was living in the castle?
Er. Well...
The others in the castle were...the small Prince.
zh: 另外住在城堡里的人是。。。一位小王子。

en: Queen Mummy and King Daddy!
That's right! They were all living there as well.
zh: 说得对！他们全都住在城堡里。

en: Did King Daddy have a big tummy?
zh: 国王爸爸的肚子很大吗？

en: Of course not! He was very handsome, like me.
zh: 当然不大！他很帅气，像我一样。

en: Anyway, there was also a dragon!
Dine-Saw?
A dinosaur? Oh, yes,
It wasn't a dragon. It was a dinosaur!
zh: 它不是龙。它是一只恐龙！

en: Living outside was a huge, fierce dinosaur!
zh: 住在城堡外的是一只巨大，凶恶的恐龙！

en: Oh, dear! Maybe the dinosaur wasn't quite that fierce, Daddy Pig?
zh: 哦，天啊！也许这只恐龙并没有那么凶恶，猪爸爸？

en: Sorry, George. No, the dinosaur was very gentle.
zh: 对不起，乔治。不，那恐龙很温和。

en: It ate lots of grass.
Daddy Pig!
Oh, sorry. I was being the dinosaur.
zh: 哦，抱歉。我假装自己是只恐龙。

en: Daddy, why is the princess called ''The Sleepy Princess''?
zh: 爸爸，为什么要公主被叫“沉睡公主”呢？

en: I'm coming to that.
You see, the sun set.
Then the stars and moon came out.
And everyone got very sleepy.
But the most sleepy of all was the Sleepy Princess!
zh: 但感到最困的是沉睡公主！

en: Peppa? Are you sleepy?
No, Daddy! I am not sleepy at all.
But somebody is.
George! Wake up!
You'll miss the end of the story!
zh: 你会错过故事的结局的！

en: Well, Peppa might not be sleepy,
but the Sleepy Princess certainly was.
zh: 但是沉睡公主肯定困了。

en: Looking at herseIf all day in the mirror had completely worn her out.
zh: 她整天看着镜子里的自己，累坏了。

en: Let's carry you to bed. Goodnight!
zh: 让我抱你去睡觉吧。晚安！

en: The Sleepy Princess was so sleepy, she had fallen fast asleep.
zh: 沉睡公主太困了，她很快就睡着了。

en: Thank you for that story, King Daddy!
zh: 谢谢你的故事，国王爸爸！

en: You're welcome, Queen Mummy.
And our little prince andprincess enjoyed it, too!
zh: 我们的小王子和小公主很喜欢这个故事！
